title: Winning horse of Velka Pardubicka disqualified for doping
title_page: Winning horse of Velka Pardubicka disqualified for doping | Daily Mail Online
text:
Winning horse of Velka Pardubicka disqualified for doping
PRAGUE (AP) — The winning horse of last year's 125th edition of the Velka Pardubicka steeplechase has been stripped of the victory after testing positive for caffeine and theobromine.
It is the first time the winner of the race has tested positive for doping. The 6.9-kilometer (4.3-mile) race is considered one of the toughest in Europe.
The Czech Jockey Club's disciplinary committee announced its decision to disqualify the winning horse, Nikas, on Thursday. Earlier in January, the results of the "B'' sample confirmed the initial positive test.
